params._liqudityAmount: is amount of stable coin tokens to secure
is amount of stable coin tokens to secure
params._liquidityHolderAddr: is address of address to assign cover

params._coverTokens: is number of tokens to cover
params._durationSeconds: is number of seconds to cover

returns._contractType: is a type of insured contract
returns._insuredContract: is an addres of insured contract

returns._annualInsuranceCost: is percentage of cover tokens that is required to be paid for 1 year of insurance
returns._maxCapacities: is a max token amount that a user can buy
returns._stakedSTBL: is how much stable coin are staked on this PolicyBook
